channel.title: Publications on Leonardo Benicio
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Consul: Rails Web Application Scalability and Performance Improvements with Distributed Computation
item.description: Undergraduate monograph at IME-USP (Computer Science). Focuses on improving scalability and performance of a Rails application using distributed computation.

item.title: Improving the Scalability and Performance of a Rails Application: A Case Study with Consul
item.description: Case study evaluating scalability and performance improvements of a Ruby on Rails application using Consul.

item.title: Optimizing HPC Deployment: Enhancing Accessibility and Efficiency through the OMPC Framework
item.description: Paper presented at ERAD-SP 2024. Proposes the OMPC framework to improve accessibility and efficiency for HPC deployments.
